topics.body:
*continues to fly..*

"..I think i see something up ahead! It's.. uh.."

*stares, muffled speeches can be heard*

*clearing*

"Did you hear me? Come back!"

"..R-right. I'm on it!"

*clenches head and flies back*

------------------------------------------
okay i should stop revealing dialogue for this

topics.body:
I will continue to spoil my collaborative project.

[spoiler]"Buddy, you alright? You lost me for a sec."

"..It's fine, just got a bit spacey."

"That's my point... Don't fall bac-"

"You don't tell me not to fall back! Last time I checked, i was the leader."

"..Okay then."

"..My bad."

"..."

"Drop it."[/spoiler]
